properties.description:
The workflow covers below scenarios:

1) HTTP action with GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE methods

2) Test Third party APIs

3) Test Relative URLS with parameters

4) Verify if non JSON output formats work as expected

5) Verify running API from remote environments

6) Test Cookies
